job.jobname: Update order rows to actual price pricelist

step.datasource: SELECT ordernr as headerid, ordernr, id, regel, artcode, prijs83 as old_prijs83, prijs_n as old_prijs_n, (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = N'LIEBHERR''15-''18' AND items.condition = 'A' AND GETDATE() > staffl.validfrom AND GETDATE() < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode) as prijs83, (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = N'LIEBHERR''15-''18' AND items.condition = 'A' AND GETDATE() > staffl.validfrom AND GETDATE() < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode) as prijs_n FROM orsrg r WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE r.ordernr IN ( '52101296', '52200744', '52201312', '52201396', '52201398', '52201651', '52201678', '52201852', '52201853', '52201885', '52202192', '52202193', '52202282', '52300002', '52300003', '52300004', '52300005', '52300006', '52300007', '52300008', '52300009', '52300010', '52300011', '52300012', '52300013', '52300014', '52300015', '52300016', '52300017', '52300018', '52300019', '52300020', '52300021', '52300022', '52300023', '52300024', '52300025', '52300026', '52300027', '52300028', '52300029', '52300030', '52300031', '52300032', '52300033', '52300034', '52300035', '52300037', '52300038', '52300039', '52300062', '52300094', '52300108', '52300120', '52300121', '52300123', '52300175', '52300178', '52300179', '52300195', '52300254', '52300255', '52300256', '52300257', '52300297', '52300356', '52300377', '52300471', '52300472', '52300499', '52300510', '52300552', '52300554', '52300555', '52300603', '52300604', '52300613', '52300705', '52300708', '52300709', '52300710', '52300718', '52300719', '52300720', '52300721', '52300723', '52300796', '52300797', '52300827', '52300828', '52300829', '52300830', '52300842', '52300843', '52300865' ) AND (ar_soort <> 'P') AND artcode NOT LIKE '%TXT%' AND prijs_n > .1 AND r.uitgifte = 0 AND r.afldat > GETDATE() AND prijs83 <> (SELECT top 1 (CASE WHEN staffl.kort_pbn = 'M' THEN ((items.CostPriceStandard * ISNULL(staffl.unitfactor, 1)) * ( 1 + staffl.bedr1/100)) ELSE staffl.prijs83 END) FROM staffl JOIN items ON items.ItemCode = staffl.artcode WHERE staffl.prijslijst = N'LIEBHERR''15-''18' AND items.condition = 'A' AND GETDATE() > staffl.validfrom AND GETDATE() < staffl.validto AND items.ItemCode = r.artcode)
